item.title: Bikes blocking at BakerStreet outside 43-45 dorset street, 14th August
item.description:
Lime bikes blocking pavement and cycle stand outside 70 baker street jn to Dorset Street and also outside 64 baker street need to clear out and fix it.

item.title: Above tennant using business bins, 14th August
item.description:
Scope charity shop We have business bins outside our shop at the back. Our recycling bin is abused by the tenants above us. Recently we had to pay a charge of150 pounds to have it cleared. We have come in today to find it with rubbish from 125A the broadway. A rubbish bag in our recycling bin. Two days after we just paid to have it cleared. Our number is 02083016452 Find images attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building materials on pavement, 14th August
item.description:
There is building work taking place at a property which has been going on for a long time now, they have a [portable loo] on the pavement outside which is blocking access to the pavement could this be looked into please. as causing an obstruction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Culver Avenue, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Need a safe cycle path crossing between valette street and hackney library, 14th August
item.description:
At present there is a cycle route down paragon road but it does not connect to the cycle path to the west of hackney central library. There needs a safe crossing for the hundreds of bikes from clapton and homerton who want to cross hackney central area
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Paragon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping Continuous, 14th August
item.description:
This has been reported repeatedly and nothing seems to have been done. Rubbish is constantly been dumped either in front of the gates to the industrial estate or against residential property walls, pillars etc. There is general waste, furniture, bed sheets at the gate and all along the road. Can this please be collected and removed and some prevention measures implemented.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin Not emptied in the same place again, 14th August
item.description:
Morning - I contacted yesterday regards to the bin not being emptied. This is directly outside a breakfast restaurant and really does not look good. Can you provide me with an email in the "update" that I can chat to someone further to avoid future reporting please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, London Bridge, The Borough, London
